node.title: Co-op adventure about saving broken marriage wins Game of the Year
node.alt: A screen split down the middle showing two dolls playing in a video game.
node.description: It Takes Two has won the top gong at the 2021 Game Awards, a prize that has been previously won by The Last of Us Part II, God of War and The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
node.content:
["It Takes Two, a co-op adventure about a couple fixing their broken marriage, has won\u00a0the\u00a0Game of the Year\u00a0 gong at the 2021 Game Awards.", "It also took home the awards for Best Family Game and Best Multiplayer Game, having been nominated in six categories.", "Developed by Hazelight Studios, It Takes Two follows the story of May and Cody, who are going through a divorce.", "When their daughter unknowingly transports their minds into two dolls, they must reconnect to find their way back to their bodies.", "It Takes Two, available on PC, PlayStation and Xbox,\u00a0beat Nintendo's Metroid Dread, Resident Evil Village, Psychonauts 2, Deathloop and\u00a0Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart to take out the top gong.", "The Game of the Year Award has previously gone to\u00a0The Last of Us Part II (2020),\u00a0Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice (2019), God of War (2018) and\u00a0The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild (2017).", "The Game Awards have become the \"Oscars of gaming\"\u00a0\u2014 although far more people tune in.", "Last year, the Game Awards drew about 83 million viewers, whereas this year's Academy Awards had its smallest ever\u00a0rating of just 9.8 million.", "Part of the reason the Game Awards attract so many viewers is because the show features big announcements and reveals from producers who want to show off their next big thing.", "Here are\u00a0a few of the big ones from this year.", "
Star Wars\u00a0Eclipse
", "In a galaxy far, far away \u2026\u00a0so far that it hasn't even got a release date yet, there is a new Star Wars game.", "French video game developer Quantic Dream today dropped the first trailer for Star Wars: Eclipse.", "This latest adventure is set in the Outer Rim during the High Republic era and will feature all-new characters and environments.", "
Sonic gets a movie sequel and game
", "Speedy blue hedgehog Sonic is back with friends and a whole new world to explore.", "First the movie: Ben Schwartz returns in the titular role for Sonic 2 alongside Jim Carrey as Dr Robotnik with an ever bigger moustache.", "But this time viewers will finally get to see Tails, voiced by Colleen O'Shaughnessey, and Knuckles, voiced by Idris Elba.", "The movie is due to be released in cinemas in April 2022, the same year as SEGA release Sonic Frontiers.", "Frontiers will have an open-world similar to Breath of the Wild", "
Alan Wake 2
", "The long-awaited sequel to the 2010 game Alan Wake is finally here \u2014 or at least the trailer is.\u00a0The game won't be out until 2023.", "Alan Wake 2 is going to be a survival horror rather than a straight action game.", "The trailer gives little away, but we do know the game will be available on PC, PlayStation and Xbox.", "
Nightingale
", "One of the game announcements to cause the biggest buzz is\u00a0Nightingale, a debut by Canadian developer Inflexion Games.", "It is described as \"a shared-world survival crafting experience set in a rich, gaslamp\u00a0Victorian fantasy setting\", and\u00a0Nightingale playtesting starts in 2022.", "
Elden Ring
", "A new trailer teases a little bit more about the highly anticipated Elden Ring, which is slated for release on February 25 next year.", "The game is a collaboration between infamous\u00a0video game creator Hidetaka Miyazaki and Game of Thrones author\u00a0George R R Martin.", "The cinematic trailer reveals a bit more about the story and elements of Elden Ring.", "
Halo the\u00a0series
", "Fans have had another glimpse of the live-action\u00a0Master Chief, played by\u00a0Pablo Schreiber, in a new trailer of the upcoming Halo TV series.", "The show, due to be released in 2022 on paid streaming service Paramount+, has a big budget and\u00a0Steven Spielberg as an executive producer behind it.", "Set in the 26th-century, Halo follows the\u00a0conflict between humanity and an alien threat known as the Covenant.", "
Wonder Woman
", "Arguably the biggest surprise of the Game Awards was the revelation Wonder Woman was getting her own solo game.", "Monolith Productions,\u00a0best known for Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor, said it would be a\u00a0single-player, open-world, action game.", "Set in the DC Universe,\u00a0Diana of Themyscira will\u00a0fight to unite her Amazon family and the humans from the modern world.", "That's all we know folks.\u00a0There's no date for a release."]
